We are pleased to announce the release of NIMBLE version 1.3.0. This release includes several new features, performance improvements, and bug fixes.

## Key New Features

### Enhanced Automatic Differentiation
- Improved performance for AD-enabled functions
- Better integration with MCMC samplers
- Support for more mathematical operations

### New Distributions
- Additional built-in distributions for specialized models
- Improved parameterizations for existing distributions

### Performance Improvements
- Faster compilation times
- Optimized MCMC sampling
- Reduced memory usage

## Installation

Install the latest version from CRAN:

```r
install.packages("nimble")
```

Or from our repository:

```r
install.packages("nimble", repos = "https://r-nimble.org", type = "source")
```
